Package ch.iserver.ace.algorithm.test

Interface Summary
AlgorithmTestFactory Factory for creating all the test relevant classes.
Document  
GenerationNode A generation node represents a node that generates an operation that is sent as a request to all remote successors.
Node The node interface represents a node in a scenario graph.
NodeVisitor NodeVisitor is an interface that allows to visit nodes.
ReceptionNode This interface represents a node that receives requests.
ScenarioBuilder This interface contains the elementary operations needed to construct a scenario.
ScenarioLoader Basic interface for classes that want to load scenarios.
 

Class Summary
AbstractGenerationNode An abstract base class for all classes that generate an operation.
AbstractNode Abstract base class for node implementations.
DefaultDocument  
DefaultScenarioBuilder The default scenario builder implementation creates a scenario object.
DoNode A generation node represents the local generation of a new operation.
EndNode Node implementation that represents the end of a site lifecycle in a scenario.
ExecuteVisitor An ExecuteVisitor is a special node visitor implementation that executes a scenario.
GraphUtil Utility class that contains graph related methods.
RedoNode Node implementation that represents the generation of a redo operation.
RelayNode Node implementation that represents a relay event on the server.
Scenario This class represents a scenerio.
SimpleReceptionNode A reception node represents the reception of a remote request.
StartNode Node implementation that represents the start of the site lifecycle in a scenario.
UndoNode A node implementation that represents an undo generation event.
VerificationNode A VerificationNode can be used to verify the document state of a site at an arbitrary time in the lifecycle of a site.
VerificationResult Result holder class for verification results.
VerificationResult.Failure Represents a failed verification.
VerificationResult.Success Represents a successful verification.
XMLScenarioLoader Default implementation of the ScenarioLoader interface.
 

Exception Summary
ScenarioException Base exception thrown by this package.
ScenarioLoaderException Exception thrown by scenario loader.
VerificationException Scenario exception thrown while verifying the document state.
